ReactiveProperty.SummaryStart: Binds a view-model's property to another view-model's property.

Remarks.remarks: Everytime owner class of produces proper event the will be updated. can be even deeply nested property of private field (x=>x.Property1.Property1) but all path segments (Property1, Property2) must be observable aka must produce events.

Params.param: Selector of property to listen to.

Return.returns: Initial value of target property that should be assigned to the inview model's constructor.
New instance of that should be assigned to command property in view model's constructor.
